review: A great product that I am 100% impressed with.  With the combination of the Fire TV Stick and Plex, its makes a brilliant media system.
author: Goinpostalmarcus

review: Works great so far.  I just wish it came with a longer USB cable.  Not many TV's in my house are mounted with in 6 feet of a power outlet.  For the price though I can't really complain, but I would definitely advise you consider buying a USB extension cable.
author: Deadtired78

review: This thing is amazing! So simple to use and the quality of the picture is excellent! Love it!
author: Princess

review: I love the Fire stick and the $39 price.
author: William Craig

review: Terrible product and support. My purchased movies did not play. I contacted customer support and they were of no help. They were supposed to get back with me with three days and they still have not contacted me.
author: Mark Diserio

review: when I first purchased this, I scored it a 4 instead of 5, solely bc there was no HBOGO app included.  Now that it is, I'm very happy.  HOWEVER, I still keep it at a 4, as too often I lose wi-fi signal and too often the HD reverts to SD so I'm watching a grainy movie for intermittent periods during a movie.  I would still recommend to anyone interest in this type of device
author: LEMONFRESHDAY

review: Could not get my smart phone to recognize the fire stick on my network, working on problem. otherwise, ok works fine
author: Raymond Green
